Package fr.iutvalence.info.but.s2_01.mcq.storage.core

Class FileSystemStorage

java.lang.Object
fr.iutvalence.info.but.s2_01.mcq.storage.core.FileSystemStorage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Storage
public class FileSystemStorage extends Object implements Storage
Storage service implementation using files.

  • Constructor Details

    • FileSystemStorage

      public FileSystemStorage(File theRootDir) throws StorageAccessException
      Creates a new storage instance, with given root directory.
      Parameters:
      theRootDir - root directory (contains questionnaires and submissions directories).
      Throws:
      StorageAccessException - if root directory does not exist.

    • loadQuestionnaire

      private Questionnaire loadQuestionnaire(File file) throws StorageAccessException, QuestionnaireFormatException
      Loads a questionnaire, from a given file.
      Parameters:
      file - questionnaire file.
      Returns:
      loaded questionnaire.
      Throws:
      StorageAccessException - if storage access fails during loading.
      QuestionnaireFormatException - if questionnaire file is malformed.

    • saveQuestionnaires

      public int saveQuestionnaires(Collection<Questionnaire> questionnaires) throws StorageAccessException
      Description copied from interface: Storage
      Saves questionnaires.
      Specified by:
      saveQuestionnaires in interface Storage
      Parameters:
      questionnaires - questionnaires to save.
      Returns:
      saved questionnaires count (duplicates are not saved).
      Throws:
      StorageAccessException - if storage access fails during saving.
      See Also:
      • Storage.saveQuestionnaires(java.util.Collection)

    • saveQuestionnaire

      public boolean saveQuestionnaire(Questionnaire questionnaire)
      Description copied from interface: Storage
      Saves a single questionnaire.
      Specified by:
      saveQuestionnaire in interface Storage
      Parameters:
      questionnaire - questionnaire to save.
      Returns:
      true if questionnaire has been saved, false if a questionnaire with the same questionnaire id already exists.
